snippet: Stocks finished close to even on Wall Street, although the financial sector declined in the wake of trading losses at JPMorgan Chase.
abstract: Stock markets remain broadly even, while shares of some of the biggest bank suffer declines related to the disclosure of massive losses at JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: Stocks finished close to even on Wall Street, although the financial sector declined in the wake of trading losses at JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Stocks End Little Changed, Despite JPMorgan Loss
headline.print_headline: Shares Little Changed Despite JPMorgan Loss
